website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're in search of added durability or simply prefer the look, this sleek stainless steel bath caddy is a sound choice.
pros: Made of solid food-grade stainless steel, this rugged caddy is easy to clean and naturally rust-resistant
Timeless design works in any bathroom
Extendable arms are rubber coated to protect your tub and prevent slipping
Features an adjustable book or tablet stand and two elegant wine glass holders
Offers two compartments for bath-time necessities
cons: Arms may be too short for wider tubs

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bathtub tray! the construction is sturdy, made of stainless steel. It is expandable, so it can fit a wide range of bathtubs. The wineglass holder is perfect, and the book/tablet holder in the center works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This tub tray fits well on my older tub and the wires are flat and close enough together so that items don't fall through. However, they do allow bubbles to come up through the tray to reach items on it. It is a small issue, though. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Bath Caddy
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is a no rust stainless steel bath caddy. It is as described and no rust so far. The typical ones without stainless rust in a matter of a month and especially bad for beach cottages. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sona chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy! Bought for my parents and they love ...
customer_reviews.text: Great caddy! Bought for my parents and they love it! It stays in their tub all the time and it still has not rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Qualley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, exactly what I wanted and needed. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and works great for holding up a book or tablet. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a gift & she loved it for her claw foot tub!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's exactly what I wanted. Is very sturdy, stable, and holds both my phone and a wine glass securely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It fit my tub perfectly. Now I can spend hours soaking in my tub watching a movie on my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a book
customer_reviews.text: Fits my clawfoot tub. Perfect for a book, tablet, or phone and a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Cary0222
